name: Dac Jump smoothly in a simple dark and blue world deluxe
name_original: Dac Jump smoothly in a simple dark and blue world deluxe
description:
A small foodie is trapped in closed world. It tries to climb and escape endlessly. Will you help it to get out?

Touch to the screen to charge power and release to jump. The more power you charge, the higher you will get. Be careful, if you charge overflow, the power charge start over. Timing is important.

Features:
* Simple and quick game play
* Easy to learn, fun to master
* Clean graphics
* Music and sound
* Many achievements
* Leaderboards

music by playonloop.com
